parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services domain that is to be updated.

parameters.name: singleSignOn
parameters.description: The single sign-on option to be updated as part of the UpdateDomain action. idcInstanceArn (string) --- The ARN of the IDC instance. type (string) --- The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone. userAssignment (string) --- The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: idcInstanceArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IDC instance.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: userAssignment
nested_params.description: The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description to be updated as part of the UpdateDomain action.

nested_items.name: domainExecutionRole
nested_items.description: The domain execution role to be updated as part of the UpdateDomain action.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Specifies the timestamp of when the domain was last updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name to be updated as part of the UpdateDomain action.

nested_items.name: rootDomainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root domain unit.

nested_items.name: serviceRole
nested_items.description: The service role of the domain.

nested_items.name: singleSignOn
nested_items.description: The single sign-on option of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: idcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IDC instance.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: userAssignment
nested_items.description: The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.
